title: Top Gun: Maverick
shortSynopsis: Thirty years after his service, Maverick returns to train Top Gun graduates for a specialized mission.

title: Dune: Part One
shortSynopsis: Paul Atreides navigates political intrigue and desert warfare on the planet Arrakis.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
shortSynopsis: John Wick takes on the High Table in a globe-spanning war for freedom.

title: The Northman
shortSynopsis: A Viking prince embarks on a brutal quest to avenge his murdered father.

title: Mission: Impossible – Fallout
shortSynopsis: Ethan Hunt and his team race to prevent nuclear catastrophe after a mission goes wrong.
Two young British soldiers must deliver a message across enemy lines during WWI.

title: Ford v Ferrari
shortSynopsis: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles challenge Ferrari at Le Mans.

title: The Gentlemen
shortSynopsis: An American cannabis kingpin in London fends off rivals trying to steal his empire.

title: Nobody
shortSynopsis: A seemingly ordinary man unleashes his lethal skills after a home invasion.

title: The Revenant
shortSynopsis: A frontiersman fights for survival and revenge after being left for dead.

title: Hell or High Water
shortSynopsis: Two brothers rob banks to save their family ranch, pursued by a retiring Texas Ranger.

title: The Grey
shortSynopsis: After a plane crash in Alaska, survivors must fight the elements and wolves to survive.

title: Sicario
shortSynopsis: An FBI agent joins a covert task force targeting drug cartels near the U.S.–Mexico border.

title: Extraction
shortSynopsis: A black-market mercenary is sent to rescue an Indian crime lord's kidnapped son.

title: The Covenant
shortSynopsis: An American soldier returns to Afghanistan to rescue his local interpreter from the Taliban.

title: Logan
shortSynopsis: In a bleak future, an aging Wolverine must protect a young mutant girl from dark forces.

title: Dunkirk
shortSynopsis: Allied soldiers are evacuated from the beaches of Dunkirk under relentless enemy fire.

title: A Man Called Otto
shortSynopsis: A grumpy widower's life changes when a lively family moves in next door.

title: Tenet
shortSynopsis: A secret agent manipulates time to prevent global annihilation in a nonlinear conflict.

title: The Last Duel
shortSynopsis: In 14th century France, a knight challenges a squire to a trial by combat over a serious accusation.
